alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 02 at 4:10AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Telfair, Wilcox and Dodge Counties. Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville affecting Bleckley and Pulaski Counties. Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Wheeler, Treutlen and Montgomery Counties. Oconee River at Dublin affecting Johnson, Washington, Laurens and Wilkinson Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, Juliette, Dames Ferry, Macon, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Clinchfield, Hawkinsville, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Oconee River Basin...including Penfield, Milledgeville, Oconee, Oconee, McIntyre, Irwinton, Oconee, Dublin, Mount Vernon... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at Abbeville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Flooding of farm lands...timberlands...and access roads will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 AM EDT Sunday was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.5 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
